name: Number
methods: public function set__field_name__($value) { $value = str_replace(',', '.', $value); $this->row['__field_name__'] = $value; $value = mysql_real_escape_string($value); $timestamp = time(); $sql = "UPDATE `__table_name__` SET `__field_name__`='$value', `__timestamp__` = $timestamp, `__operation__` = 'UPDATE'  WHERE `id`='{$this->id}'"; Database::getInstance()->sql($sql); } public function get__field_name__() { $value = $this->row['__field_name__']; settype($value, 'float'); return $value; }
